content.text:
All I Want for Christmas is You
by Mariah Carey

There're several chordcharts for this song, but all of them seem to kind of miss something,
whether it's a chord, or simply get something wrong. I'm hoping mine gives you the best of all.

Standard tuning, no capo. Key of G, typical for Soprano singers.
See below for vocal guide for key selection.

Chord voicings I use (All open unless otherwise noted):

G:         320033

[Verse 1]

[ch]Am[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]Dm[/ch]
Same bed, but it feels just a little bit bigger now
[ch]G[/ch]               [ch]G7[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]C/B[/ch]
Our song on the radio, but it don't sound the same
[ch]Am[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]                             [ch]Dm[/ch]
When our friends talk about you all it does is just tear me down
[ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]
Cause my heart breaks a little when I hear your name


[Pre-Chorus]

   [ch]C/B[/ch]                  [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch] 
It all just sounds like ooh, ooh, oooh, oooh
[ch]Bb[/ch]                                [ch]C[/ch]  
Mmm too young, too dumb to realize


[Chorus]

     [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]
That I should've bought you flowers and held your hand
                        [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]
Shoulda gave you all my hours when I had the chance
                  [ch]F[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]Am[/ch]    
Take you to every party cause all you wanted to do was dance
[ch]D7[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]Fm[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]C/B[/ch]
Now my baby's dancing, but she's dancing with another man


[Verse 2]

[ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]Dm[/ch]
My pride, my ego, my needs and my selfish ways
[ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]G7[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]C/B[/ch]
Caused a good strong woman like you to walk out my life
         [ch]Am[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]                         [ch]Dm[/ch]
Now I'll never, never get to clean up the mess I made ooh
[ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]G7[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]
And that haunts me every time I close my eyes


[Pre-Chorus]

   [ch]C/B[/ch]                  [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch] 
It all just sounds like ooh, ooh, oooh, oooh
[ch]Bb[/ch]                                [ch]C[/ch]  
Mmm too young, too dumb to realize


[Chorus]

     [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]
That I should've bought you flowers and held your hand
                        [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]
Shoulda gave you all my hours when I had the chance
                  [ch]F[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]Am[/ch]    
Take you to every party cause all you wanted to do was dance
[ch]D7[/ch]            [ch]F[/ch]                  [ch]Fm[/ch]                   [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]C/B[/ch]             
Now my baby's dancing, but she's dancing with another man


[Bridge]

            [ch]F[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]C/B[/ch]
Although it hurts I'll be the first to say that I was wrong
      [ch]D7[/ch]
Oh, I know I'm probably much too late
           [ch]Dm[/ch]
To try and apologize for my mistakes
           [ch]G[/ch]
But I just want you to know


[Outro]

                   [ch]F[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]
I hope he buys you flowers, I hope he holds your hand
                 [ch]F[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
Give you all his hours when he has the chance
                  [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]Am[/ch]    
Take you to every party cause I remember how much you love to dance
[ch]D7[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]Fm[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]              
Do all the things I should've done when I was your man
[ch]D7[/ch]                  [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]Fm[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]   
Do all the things I should've done when I was your man

        [ch]F[/ch]

[Chorus]
      [ch]F[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]

             [ch]E[/ch]

Sesuka hatimu

          [ch]Am[/ch]

[ch]Am[/ch]

[ch]E[/ch]

[Chorus]

[VERSE 1]

[ch]G[/ch]                          [ch]D[/ch]
When the rain is blowing in your face
[ch]F[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]
And the whole world is on your case
[ch]Cm[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
I would offer you a warm embrace
[ch]A7[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
To make you feel my love.


[VERSE 2]

[ch]G[/ch]                              [ch]D[/ch]
When evening shadows and the stars appear
  [ch]F[/ch]                             [ch]C[/ch]
And there is no one there to dry your tears
[ch]Cm[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]
I could hold you for a million years
[ch]A7[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
To make you feel my love.


[BRIDGE 1]

[ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
I know you haven't made your mind up yet
[ch]B7[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
But I would never do you wrong.
[ch]C[/ch]                                [ch]G[/ch]
I've known it from the moment that we met
[ch]A7[/ch]                        [ch]D7[/ch]  
No doubt in my mind where you belong


[VERSE 3]

[ch]G[/ch]                         [ch]D[/ch]
I'd go hungry, I'd go black and blue
[ch]F[/ch]                          [ch]C[/ch]
I'd go crawling down the avenue.
[ch]Cm[/ch]                        [ch]G[/ch]
There's nothing that I wouldn't do
[ch]A7[/ch]          [ch]D7[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
To make you feel my love.


[INSTRUMENTAL]

[ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]    [ch]F[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]Cm[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]A7[/ch]   [ch]D7[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]

[ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
The storms are raging on the rollin' sea.
[ch]B7[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
And on the highway of regret
[ch]C[/ch]                                    [ch]G[/ch]
The winds of change are blowing wild and free.
[ch]A7[/ch]                  [ch]D7[/ch]         [ch]C/D[/ch]
You ain't seen nothing like me yet.


[OUTRO]

[ch]G[/ch]                          [ch]D[/ch]
I could make you happy, make your dreams come true.
[ch]F[/ch]                           [ch]C[/ch]
There’s nothing that I would not do.
[ch]Cm[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]
Go to the ends of the earth for you
[ch]A7[/ch]            [ch]D7[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
To make you feel my love.
[ch]A7[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
To make you feel my love.
